  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Poids sur terre et sur Mars</string>
            <string language="en">Weight on Earth and on Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewicht auf Masse und auf Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Peso na terra e em Marte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Peso su terra e su Marte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάρος στη γη και στον Αρη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Peso en la tierra y en Marte</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration compare le poids d'un homme sur une balance de salle de bains sur terre (au-dessus) et sur Mars (en bas).</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the weight of a man through the bathroom scale on Earth (top) and on Mars (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">balancede salle de bains</string>
            <string language="en">bathroom scales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Mars</string>
            <string language="en">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la masse</string>
            <string language="en">Mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">poids</string>
            <string language="en">weight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht das Gewicht eines 
Mannes durch die Badezimmerskala auf Masse (Oberseite) und auf Mars 
(Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara o peso de um homem 
através da escala de banheiro na terra (alto) e em Marte (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta il peso di un uomo 
attraverso la scala di stanza da bagno su terra (parte superiore) e su
Marte (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει το βάρος ενός ατόμου 
μέσω της κλίμακας λουτρών στη γη (κορυφή) και στον Αρη (κατώτατο
σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara a peso de un hombre a 
través de la báscula de baño en la tierra (tapa) y en Marte 
(fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Badezimmerskalen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escalas de banheiro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Marte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">peso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scale di stanza da bagno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Marte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">peso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κλίμακες λουτρών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάζα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βάρος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">básculas de baño</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Masa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">peso</string>
          </keyword>
